title: 'No way it is a quality product !'
body: Bought seeing on a sale under 5K. By going thru the reviews, i found it's not what i wanted. Cancelled it. But still delivered ! It is just a jute cover stuffed with some plastic stuffing material. It is hard. One side they have kept a cushion and other side some floor mat kind of material. You cant bend much if you're using that as sofa ! I am not talking only about this particular brand. Any brand would be 'something like this' only. Avoid it if you're looking for a quality product. back rest is small even for a 2nd standard kid (for sofa).

title: 'Simple and very useful'
body: 'If you are looking for a smart foldable sofa cum bed then go ahead and buy this. It can be used in your bedroom or a second room where you can use it as a sofa in the morning and convert it to a bed in the night. It is firm and suitable to sit for a long time. It is not soft when u sleep so people expecting a soft bed look elsewhere. I am using it as a sofa in my home theatre room and it is comfortable.'
